<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script">
    <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <abort_action>false</abort_action>
        <access>package_private</access>
        <action_delete>false</action_delete>
        <action_insert>true</action_insert>
        <action_query>false</action_query>
        <action_update>true</action_update>
        <active>false</active>
        <add_message>false</add_message>
        <advanced>true</advanced>
        <change_fields>false</change_fields>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <collection>dmn_demand_task</collection>
        <condition/>
        <description/>
        <execute_function>false</execute_function>
        <filter_condition table="dmn_demand_task">category=initial_review^stateCHANGESTO3^NQstateVALCHANGES^EQ<item display_value="Initial review" endquery="false" field="category" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="initial_review"/>
            <item display_value="Closed Complete" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="3"/>
            <item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="true" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/>
            <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/>
        </filter_condition>
        <is_rest>false</is_rest>
        <message/>
        <name>Auto Demand Task Creation</name>
        <order>100</order>
        <priority>100</priority>
        <rest_method/>
        <rest_method_text/>
        <rest_service/>
        <rest_service_text/>
        <rest_variables/>
        <role_conditions/>
        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    //Parameters passed to Script Include
    var dmnUtil = new wfDemandUtils(); // Script Include
    var dmnParent;
    var shortDesc;
    var taskCat;

	gs.addInfoMessage(current.state);


    if ((current.category == 'initial_review') && (current.state == 3)) {
        //var taskCat;
        gs.addInfoMessage("hello");
        dmnParent = current.parent.getValue('sys_id');
        shortDesc = "Preprod Validation";
        taskCat = "Prepod Validation test";
        dmnUtil.createDemandTask(dmnParent, shortDesc, taskCat);
    }

    if ((current.u_task_category == 'Prepod Validation') && (current.state == 3)) {
        //var taskCat;
        gs.addInfoMessage("hello");
        dmnParent = current.parent.getValue('sys_id');
        shortDesc = "Preprod Validation";
        taskCat = "Implementation";
        dmnUtil.createDemandTask(dmnParent, shortDesc, taskCat);
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>Gokul Nath</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-09-06 04:30:49</sys_created_on>
        <sys_domain>global</sys_domain>
        <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path>
        <sys_id>28467d264745f550020ba9f8536d4304</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>34</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Auto Demand Task Creation</sys_name>
        <sys_overrides/>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_28467d264745f550020ba9f8536d4304</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>Gokul Nath</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-10-14 12:02:56</sys_updated_on>
        <template/>
        <when>after</when>
    </sys_script>
    <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=28467d264745f550020ba9f8536d4304"/>
</record_update>
